text.name: I want to go back
text.text:
I'm stuck, I'm stuck here.
it wasn't a dream, I was standing relaxing enjoying the evening on the roof
when the sky broke, I don't know what happened
soon after the sun vanished, I found myself somewhere else
expanse of my cabin, the exact same cabin. Gentle wind with drizzling rain, I thought I died and this was heaven.
I must've spent hours just going through those replicas of my cabin, every single one was the same 
a bench on the porch, windows 
I think there's something special about this configuration 
something special about the layout of my cabin 
it can't be a coincidence 
I can't tell how many hours passed when I was whisked back home, the sky was normal again 
I wish to go back 
all I want to do is to get back there 
it wasn't a dream
